name: Rush! (KayB_Design)
description:
Rush! Is a 3d-arcade, endless runner game, in the style of low-poly style. I was inspired to make this game from games like subway surfers, Run 3 and I took the art style inspiration from crossy road.

The player will be running along 3 paths and will have to switch between each path with a button presses, to avoid traps, walls, logs, bats and rocks. The goal is to get through each stage, or see how far you can get there will be different types of game modes, campaign which will have a story, and endless mode where you go as far as you can.

The main character is a Fox, the goal of the campaign is to get through different areas of a forest and caves.
